element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text:
This algorithm applies contrast stretching to a single-band (grey scale) image. Contrast stretching modifies the range of values in the image, applying a linear transformation. The goal of the algorithm is to change the values of the input image so they make full use of the available dynamic range.
To avoid outliers reducing the effectiveness of this process, the original range of the input layer is not used, but a fraction of it defined by percentiles (usually 5% and 95%)

element.name: LOWER
element.text: The lower percentile to define the efecctive range.

element.name: UPPER
element.text: The upper percentile to define the efecctive range.
